documents.document: @SavageFc602 @TellEmSteveDave he IS the disorder in the court, for the most part. I think we should appeal to Troy!

@stevemcneil just seen this, myself and @psibreaker are there on Friday.
. @TellEmSteveDave may I suggest a bar & grill called "@Chris_Laudando's Roast House" (w/ a cat running away) be added to the #TESDtown map
. @piersmorgan probably more than you got paid to hack a dead child's phone and @arobertwebb kept his soul.
Lads, can we all do a protest when I'm not on a late in work!? I really want to be there but working horrid hours makes it difficult.

@Aims_86 @ItsBadger_ I hope so! I forgot to tell you what I wrote to Walt! I couldn't think of anything to make him so just...

The problem with facts is even if you decide not to believe them they're still true. You don't get to pick and choose reality.
@kerenhappuch @TellEmSteveDave @BQQuinn @simmykay I've just drawn an outline of Staten Island on my TV. Worth it to correct the travesty.

I'm having a "cry in the office" kind of day. Lovely IJ fans and #TESDants, and listening to #TESD are making things better.

I am doing my best to be a good #TESDant and working my way through the full back catalogue and all of Comic Book Men.
@BBCRadio2 @realDonaldTrump no. Have you seen a single scrap of evidence he's out for anyone but himself?
@matthwatson it's 9am, I'm in work. I'm unfortunately already part of this horrid day.

@Fiona1710 she is OBSESSED with peonies! Every design, no matter what they ask for, she draws a peony. It's hilarious!
@Fiona1710 "have you considered a peony? I hear you wanted a pocket watch so I drew you a peony" - Alice to every customer.
@NunchuckSkills not completely. I just really enjoyed seeing how they interacted. The "you look like" changed every time too.
@NunchuckSkills I live in London so Dublin was the travelling one! Gutted I couldn't make Manchester but 5 shows was too much (even for me)
3 lates in a row means I can't, but you should definitely go to this. @OwenBenjamin is fantastic. https://t.co/6xHYzSaRLf
Did anyone else get @jamessmurray's Chris Farley reference last night, about @BQQuinn living in a van down by the river? #LaughedWayTooLoud

Fourth show for me. An absolute joy to be there. Thank you @Joe_Gatto @jamessmurray @SalVulcano @BQQuinn. I have no other words.
@jamessmurray I got your Chris Farley reference and laughed way too loud. Do I get points?
Surprised I could hold my hand still long enough to take the picture. Polaroid from @BQQuinn. A surreal and amazingâ€¦ https://t.co/57817XAEcR
4th times... Possibly a bit excessive? So excited @BQQuinn @SalVulcano @jamessmurray @Joe_Gatto https://t.co/nKeqrTEC2m

@ItsBadger_ 19:35. Where you flying to and what time?
@ItsBadger_ waiting to board, so in about 2 hours I will be!
@ItsBadger_ I'm a doof, it's his Twitter! Sorry, just got to the airport and sat down so missed out on stuff I think.
@ItsBadger_ where is that from!?
@ItsBadger_ HA! I can see my stupid face!
@ItsBadger_ someone got a picture! It is now my phone background because I'm cool like that! Haha!
@NunchuckSkills haha, no worries. We headed home. Tired heads and empty wallets all round! It was amazing! I got an Ant salute!
I saluted Q. This is him saluting back at me. I'm a very happy Ant. ðŸœðŸœðŸœðŸœðŸœðŸœ https://t.co/ahEd3cOe1K

One of the genuine highlights of the last 4 days has been meeting the other #TESDants. Such amazing people.

@SirLadyFoxalot hiya love! T-shirts (3 styles) are 25, there's a hoodie for Â£55, programmes Â£15, mugs, keyrings and bracelets.
@hannahfeerick haha, not quite! I'm in the flats.
@hannahfeerick @Joe_Gatto yeah I am! 5th row! They'll be sick of the sight of me! Where are you sitting?
Gutted I can't go see @Joe_Gatto tonight but lack of funds from too many IJ tickets/feeling obliged to actually see my family. Tomorrow tho!
@Fiona1710 yeah! Literally just arrived. Here until Wednesday evening
Told my 3 year old niece what's on my nails she's now walking round the house shouting "I'm Nugget!". Nuggalo in the making @WhatSayYouPod
@aliishotton I thought I was the only one who cheered that! So glad there were others!
@WhatSayYouPod @Chris_Laudando I'll get on it immediately, sir!

Thank you so damn much @jamessmurray @Joe_Gatto @SalVulcano @BQQuinn @truTVjokers. See you tomorrow for 3rd row.
Dear London #TESDants. Is anyone interested in but unable to attend IJ? If so and you're free tomorrow please get in touch. (looking for 2)
Tonight I finally get to see @jamessmurray @BQQuinn @SalVulcano @Joe_Gatto! And tomorrow. And Tuesday. I may not be cool but I'm happy!
